DOC.brief_summary: The investigators will examine the balance between IVF success in terms of outcome parameters, using a mild ovarian stimulation protocol, opposing it to the conventional stimulation regimens in poor responders undergoing IVF.
DOC.brief_title: Mild Versus Conventional Ovarian Stimulation for Poor Responders Undergoing In Vitro Fertilisation
DOC.criteria: poor responders (age>40, previous POR, abnormal OR test) indication for IVF regular cycling patients BMI 1935 contraindication for clomiphene citrate use or to GnRH agonists antagonists BMI > 35
